item.name: MySQL: [log] avisos no arquivo {$MYSQL_LOG}
item.description:
1 se a expressão for encontrada
Retorna ZBX_NOTSUPPORTED se o arquivo nao puder ser lido pelo usuario zabbix. Neste caso adicionei o usuário zabbix ao grupo mysql: usermod -G mysql -a zabbix /etc/init.d/zabbix-agent restart
https://www.zabbix.com/documentation/2.0/manual/config/items/itemtypes/zabbix_agent

item.name: MySQL: [mysql] queries por segundo
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL: [mysql] slow queries
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL: [mysql] status
item.description:
It requires user parameter mysql.ping, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf
0 - MySQL server is down 1 - MySQL server is up

item.name: MySQL: [mysql] uptime
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL: [mysql] versão
item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.uptime, which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL: [mysql] [bytes] [enviados] por segundo
item.description:
The number of bytes sent to all clients.
It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL: [mysql] [bytes] [recebidos] por segundo
item.description:
The number of bytes received from all clients.
It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.description: It requires user parameter mysql.status[*], which is defined in userparameter_mysql.conf.

item.name: MySQL: [rede] status conexão na porta {$MYSQL_PORTA}
item.description:
Check, if it is possible to make TCP connection to port number port.
0 - cannot connect 1 - can connect
https://www.zabbix.com/documentation/2.0/manual/config/items/itemtypes/zabbix_agent
